# aduit-trail

Custom project with below api:

POST /api/documents
 

Request: title, description, category,...

## Framework
- FastAPI
- Database: PostgreSQL

## Detected Entities
- **User** - CRUD endpoints at /api/users
- **Product** - CRUD endpoints at /api/products
- **Order** - CRUD endpoints at /api/orders

## Features
- auth
- rest_api
- graphql
- celery
- docker
- tests

## Endpoints

### Auto-generated based on description:
- GET /api/users - List all users
- GET /api/users/{{id}} - Get single user
- POST /api/users - Create new user
- PUT /api/users/{{id}} - Update user
- DELETE /api/users/{{id}} - Delete user
- GET /api/products - List all products
- GET /api/products/{{id}} - Get single product
- POST /api/products - Create new product
- PUT /api/products/{{id}} - Update product
- DELETE /api/products/{{id}} - Delete product
- GET /api/orders - List all orders
- GET /api/orders/{{id}} - Get single order
- POST /api/orders - Create new order
- PUT /api/orders/{{id}} - Update order
- DELETE /api/orders/{{id}} - Delete order

## Setup

```bash
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate
pip install -r requirements.txt
uvicorn main:app --reload
```

Visit http://localhost:8000/docs for interactive API documentation.
